name: Shadow Knight (MrDeeDz)
description:
Submitted for #luxjam01 .

Shadow Knight is our very first game! we're a team of 3 & the last 48 hours have been absolutely awesome!

 We hope you enjoy it.

 GLHF

Created by: Yamen Sahyouni, Nader Jawhary, Danny Kontar
